name: Yeeted to Safety
description:
You're Frank Rimbo, a professional salvager, who must rescue as much passengers and crates as possible.

  Controls
  • Move : WASD / ZQSD / Arrows
  • Dash & Grab : Right Click / Space
  • YEET : Left Click
Credits
  • Chenipain : graphics and some code
  • Ashtrail : most code

Music :  "Run Faster" by FesliyanStudios

Made with Godot 3.2.2
